channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1389] Convert all wildcard imports to explicit imports
item.summary: Convert all wildcard imports to explicit imports

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fixed in r1616488. Most of these wildcards were brought in with my initial patch for TIKA-1387. Sorry about that!

Edit: Removed tika-java7 comment, since there are no wildcards in that module!

SUCCESS: Integrated in tika-trunk-jdk1.7 #149 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-trunk-jdk1.7/149/)
Fix for TIKA-1389, remove wildcard imports from project. (tpalsulich: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1616488)
